DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy brimonidine 0.1 % ophthalmic solution compare brimonidine 0.2 % ophthalmic solution patient glaucoma ocular hypertension
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Brimonidine Patients With Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Ocular hypertension glaucoma eye Uncontrolled systemic disease Known allergy sensitivity brimonidine
